content.question: Which of the following practices would best help to protect against inland and coastal flooding in urban areas?

choices.label: Regulating the use of pesticides and fertilizers in agriculture
Preserving wetland and coastal mangrove habitats
Increasing the capacity of the sewer lines so they can handle a larger volume of water
Straightening stream channels to increase stream flow

content.answer: Preserving wetland and coastal mangrove habitats

topic.text: 8.4: Human Impacts on Wetlands and Mangroves
